name: Sandstone (RSL)
description:
A unique 2D puzzle platforming game, Sandstone challenges players as the more you move, the more you shrink!

The  smaller you are, the higher you can jump - use this to your advantage but be careful not to shrink out of existence!

Jump, shrink, hi-jump and fall your way through all the 16 levels.

Controls:

Arrow keys: movement,  Space: Hi-Jump(when token has been collected), R: Quick restart
